backend/main.mo: Canister implementing product CRUD, authorization checks, file uploads, and purchase tracking using maps and mixin storage/authorization modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence metadata for deployment retry and error-surfacing features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files covering layout, components, pages, hooks, and deployment utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for storefront, product pages, admin dashboard, and library, wrapped with theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied UI showing an error message and navigation button back to the storefront.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Header with logo, navigation links, role-aware buttons, and user greeting based on profile and admin status.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright, a developer tools modal trigger, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page wrapper combining header, main content, and footer into a consistent app layout.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrated with Internet Identity, handling states, errors, and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product preview card showing metadata, price, publish status badge, and link to the product detail page.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal that collects a user's name and saves their profile using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/RequestUpdateMod: Developer tools modal enabling update requests, retry command copying, and deployment failure report generation.
frontend/src/components/SearchAndFilterB: Search bar component that updates a query string based on user input.
frontend/src/components/StorefrontHero.t: Hero section for the storefront with a title, description, and featured image.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, products, and storefront data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with light/dark theme variables and shared layout utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, configures React Query, and wraps the app with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin interface for managing products, including creation, editing, publishing, deleting, and file uploads with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/BuyerLibraryPage.tsx: Displays a user's purchased products and handles secure file downloads with error handling and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product info, handles purchasing, and redirects users to their library after a successful purchase.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Public storefront listing products with search filtering, loading states, and optional profile setup prompts.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentCommands.ts: Provides recommended deployment retry and diagnostic command lists for IC deployments.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentFixSuggeste: Generates suggested fixes for deployment failures by analyzing parsed error patterns from build, bundle, or install steps.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentLogParser.t: Parses raw deployment logs to detect failing steps and extract relevant error text blocks.
frontend/src/utils/formatDeploymentRepor: Formats parsed deployment errors and fix suggestions into a readable multi-section failure report.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s state, feature list, known issues, and metadata for build and planning.
